attributes.action: ask the organisers of the Isle of Wight Festival and Carling to bring back the Beer Amnesty in 2010
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Everybody who attends the Isle of Wight Festival knows what a great job the festival organisers and the sponsor Carling do in entertaining all the festival goers. Usually this entertainment involves the Carling Beer Amnesty, which not only plays great tunes, but also provides cold Carling in the manner of 'A Can for a Can'. This was not present at the 2009 festival and many festival goers with camping tickets were gutted. We, the undersigned, would love it back in 2010 if at all possible and we ask the Prime Minister to ask the IOW festival and Carling to provide this for the thousands of people it usually entertains!

rejection.details: This is soley a matter for the event organisers and their sponsor.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
